name: Night After Night
description:
Night After Night is a zombie survival game with a dark, and gritty pixelated art style, set in the ravaged remains of a small town. The game has one main area with three subareas/dungeons branching off from it. The player will have to explore two of these areas in order to find the items required to unlock the final area where they can complete the game.

●Team: 

○ Håvard Gullvik - Project Manager 

○ Håvard Wullum = Game Designer 

○ Martin Talha - Programmer ○ Simen Wiig - Artist 

○ Birk Engeli - Sound Designer
